description.brief: orogen tasks for the rock tutorial

package.description: This modul contains two Tasks, RockTutorialControl and RockTutorialVisualization. RockTutorialVisualization uses the vizkit RockVisualization plugin to display a rock. RockTutorialControl receives a 2d motion commad and generates in each time step a new position and orientation for the tutorial rock.
package.author: Sascha Arnold/sascha.arnold@dfki.de/
